content.question: In lines 26-27 (“Displaces . . . nest”), the metaphor of “endangered hatchlings” suggests that “Like”

choices.label: has only recently taken on new meaning
may become extinct if it is not carefully conserved
threatens to eliminate more sophisticated language
causes language to be fragile and easily misunderstood

content.answer: threatens to eliminate more sophisticated language

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
